seo.title: About
seo.description: The context of TinaCMS and intro to the product.

blocks.headline: About Tina
blocks.subheading: TinaCMS is a developer-friendly, open-source CMS that lets you edit content directly on your site with live previews.
blocks.body:
###### A quick look at editing in TinaCMS

Powered by Git and Markdown, it's flexible enough for devs to integrate with their workflows while still offering a smooth experience for content creators.

With real-time visual editing, drag-and-drop features, and easy GitHub integration, Tina keeps your content version-controlled and in your handsâ€“no databases, no hassle.

It's fully customisable, works locally, and makes managing content feel natural for everyone involved.

To see a few ways you can edit your content, check out the intro video.
